languages.text: "Покайтесь, грешники. Облегчите душу, и Император смилуется. Живо признавайтесь, пиратствуете?! Воруете?! Торгуете контрабандой?! Не молчать!"
"Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"
languages.original_text: "Покайтесь, грешники. Облегчите душу, и Император смилуется. Живо признавайтесь, пиратствуете?! Воруете?! Торгуете контрабандой?! Не молчать!"

traits.locale_text: "Repent, sinners. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"
"Repent, sinners. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"
"Repent, sinners. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"
"Repent, sinners. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"
"Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

languages.text: “忏悔吧，罪人们。放下你们灵魂中的负担吧，帝皇以慈悲为怀。承认你们在这里犯下的一切罪行吧！你们当过海盗吗？偷盗过吗？还是走私过货物？现在就开口吧！”
languages.original_text: "Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

traits.locale_text: “忏悔吧，罪人们。放下你们灵魂中的负担吧，帝皇以慈悲为怀。承认你们在这里犯下的一切罪行吧！你们当过海盗吗？偷盗过吗？还是走私过货物？现在就开口吧！”

languages.text: «Arrepentíos, malhechores. Expiad vuestras almas, y el Emperador tendrá misericordia. ¡Admitid qué es lo que hacéis aquí! ¿Sois piratas? ¿Ladrones? ¿Contrabandistas? ¡Hablad ahora!».
languages.original_text: "Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

traits.locale_text: «Arrepentíos, pecadores. Expiad vuestras almas, y el Emperador tendrá misericordia. ¡Admitid qué es lo que hacéis aquí! ¿Sois piratas? ¿Ladrones? ¿Contrabandistas? ¡Hablad ahora!».

languages.text: 「悔い改めろ、悪人よ。その魂の重荷を下ろせば、皇帝は情けをかけてくださる。ここでしていた事を認めるんだ！海賊行為か？コソ泥か？密輸品の販売か？今すぐ吐け！」
languages.original_text: "Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

traits.locale_text: 「悔い改めろ、悪人よ。その魂の重荷を下ろせば、皇帝は情けをかけてくださる。ここでしていた事を認めるんだ！海賊行為か？コソ泥か？密輸品の販売か？今すぐ吐け！」

languages.text: "Bereut, Missetäter! Entlastet Eure Seelen, und der Imperator wird Gnade zeigen. Gesteht, was Ihr hier macht! Piraterie? Diebstahl? Verkauf von Schmuggelware? Sprecht, sofort!"
languages.original_text: "Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

traits.locale_text: "Bereut, Sünder! Entlastet Eure Seelen, und der Imperator wird Gnade zeigen. Gesteht, was Ihr hier macht! Piraterie? Diebstahl? Verkauf von Schmuggelware? Sprecht, sofort!"

languages.text: « Repentez-vous ! Soulagez votre âme, et l'Empereur se montrera clément. Avouez ce que vous faites ici ! De la piraterie ? Du vol ? De la contrebande ? Parlez maintenant ! »
languages.original_text: "Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

traits.locale_text: « Repentez-vous, pécheurs. Soulagez votre âme, et l'Empereur se montrera clément. Avouez ce que vous faites ici ! De la piraterie ? Du vol ? De la contrebande ? Parlez maintenant ! »

languages.text: "Suçlular, tövbe edin. Ruhlarınızı arındırırsanız İmparator'un merhametine nail olursunuz. Suçunuzu itiraf edin! Korsan mısınız? Hırsız mı? Yoksa kaçakçı mı? Konuşun!"
languages.original_text: "Repent, malefactors. Unburden your souls, and the Emperor will be merciful. Admit what it is you do here! Is it piracy? Thievery? Selling smuggled goods? Talk, now!"

traits.locale_text: "Suçlular, tövbe edin. Ruhlarınızı arındırırsanız İmparator’un merhametine kavuşabilirsiniz. Suçunuzu itiraf edin! Korsan mısınız? Hırsız mı? Yoksa kaçakçı mı? Konuşun!"
